|exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.8 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = ADSL2+,boot log |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.254.254 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = WIN_XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^WIN_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = GAW5.6U2B-5 |manuf_rev = REV1.0 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/09/2010 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4312; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "GAW5.6U2B-5" and "REV:1.0 081222" is silkscreened on the board. This device may be using BCM6338 (CFE identifies as :a BCM96338 design), or possibly BCM6333. Per the boot log, the device is running Linux. The default SSID appears to be '''WIN_XXXX''' where '''XXXX''' is the last :two octets of the WAN interface MAC (upper case hex letters). The WAN MAC appears to be the wireless interface MAC plus one. The power adapter included with the device is :a '''Click''' CPS012A120080U (12V, 0.8A). ==Links of Interest== [http://www.tripleoxygen.net/wp/2011/03/sagemcom-router-fst-1704-teardown/ Teardown] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The serial header is above the CPU. The default login :credentials for the serial console are admin:admin. 
to BCM4312 <-- [RxD] [TxD] [GND] [VCC] --> to RAM
{{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
